content: feeling crabby turn that mood into creativity with this adorable amigurumi crab pattern whether you want to add some ocean vibes to your collection or craft a cute gift for a sea-loving friend this little crustacean is the perfect choice with its round body tiny claws and big bubbly eyes it s sure to steal your heart grab your yarn and let s dive into the crochet sea **materials** - milk cotton 2 5mm - crochet hook 2 75 3mm - fiberfill - sewing needle scissors **permitted use** - you can sell items made from these patterns/tutorial videos a small quantity of fewer than **50 products/month ** provided that they are handmade by yourself and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling **pattern by amiguworld** https //amiguworld com/ 1 - thank you so much for purchasing the pattern i would love to see your ﬁnished doll so please share a picture with me @amiguworld and use the hashtag #amiguworld on instagram - let us know if you have a specific question or give an idea of what you re looking for we re happy to make recommendations **check out our other products** https //shop amiguworld com/ 2 https //www etsy com/shop/amiguworldshop 3 **contact** contact us via email amiguworldshop@gmail com ⁠ᵔ⁠ᴥ⁠ᵔ⁠ 1 https //amiguworld com/ 2 https //shop amiguworld com/ 3 https //www etsy com/shop/amiguworldshop
